name: Escape (itch) (CrystalTan)
description:
Our game Escape was inspired by the idea of people's addition of social media today. We want to create this game to reflect on how people obsess with posting on social media and seeing others' reaction on their posts. We want to send out the message that we should embrace our imperfections in reality and prevent deceiving ourselves by others' judgements on social media.

Try to get enough likes on social media platform and avoid hates and bad feedbacks to get through levels. In the last level, likes of the post will become the energy of the big boss which is the imagined and unreal-self on social media. You have to beat the big boss to get back to the reality. 

Press  ↑   ←  →  to move, space to jump, and right shift to fire. Enjoy!
